cheats.description: Counter-Strike 1.6 is a first-person shooter video game developed by Valve. It was released in 2000 for Windows and in 2003 for the Xbox. The game was also ported to OS X and Linux in the form of a beta in January 2013. A full release was published in April 2013.

features.title: Features
features.vac_text: Our cheat has its own VAC bypass and has never been massively detected by VAC.
features.prices_text: Our software's excellence is coupled with very reasonable pricing.
features.support_text: Our support team is available 24/7. If you have any questions, don't hesitate to contact our support team. We are happy to answer your inquiries.
